title: THE MANDALORIAN Episode 3 Breakdown, New Theories, and Details You Missed! "The Sin"

description:
Episode 3 of "The Mandalorian" is finally here! I breakdown, review, recap, and go over theories, details, and easter eggs for season one chapter 3 (The Sin).
